briefdescription.para: String representations of agc_type_t values.
Convert string representation (from command-line) to agc_type_t.
Initialize AGC structure with default values.
Free AGC structure.
In: AGC structure (not used)
In/Out: mfc[f] = cepstrum vector in frame f
In: number of frames of cepstrum vectors supplied
Normalize c0 for all frames such that max(c0) = 0.

detaileddescription.para: Apply AGC to the given mfc vectors (normalize all C0 mfc coefficients in the given input such that the max C0 value is 0, by subtracting the input max C0 from all).

briefdescription.para: Set the current AGC maximum estimate.
Get the current AGC maximum estimate.
In: AGC structure
In/Out: mfc[f] = cepstrum vector in frame f
In: number of frames of cepstrum vectors supplied
Apply AGC to the given block of MFC vectors.

detaileddescription.para: Unlike agc_max() this does not require the entire utterance to be available. Call agc_emax_update() at the end of each utterance to update the AGC parameters.

briefdescription.para: In: AGC structure
Update AGC parameters for next utterance.
In: AGC structure
In/Out: mfc[f] = cepstrum vector in frame f
In: number of frames of cepstrum vectors supplied
Apply AGC using noise threshold to the given block of MFC vectors.
Set the current AGC noise threshold.
Get the current AGC noise threshold.
